Order: the order in which we will build planned apps
Origin: the origin of the app idea
Name: the name of the app
Keywords: the keywords that will be used to market the app
Marketing: the marketing strategy for the app. Read shortFormVideoMarketing.md for more information.
Functionality: the basic functionality of the app
SkillsToLearn: the skills that will be learned while building the app
TechStack: the tech stack that will be used to build the app
desire: the desire that the app will satisfy
retention: the retention technique for the app
